recipe_name: Baked fig and goats' cheese salad
author: Nick Nairn
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Place the fig on a baking tray. Using a sharp knife, carefully make an incision halfway down the fig in the top in the shape of a cross, so the top of the fig opens up when squeezed lightly. Crumble the cheese into the exposed centre of the fig and bake in the oven for 3-4 minutes, or until the cheese starts to melt.  In a bowl, mix together the rocket and tomato with the lemon juice and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  To serve, arrange the rocket and tomato salad on a serving plate and place the baked fig on top.
